items.name: Azoth
items.description: A russet residue made from the crystals in the caves around Fog Lake. Crystals collected from the caves are boiled down, producing a sludge which re-crystallises when cooled.

consumption_effect.description: Induces out-of-body experiences when smoked

items.name: Fairy Fruits
items.description: Wondrously succulent peaches, apples, pomegranates, plums, and bunches of grapes, dripping with syrup. Fairy fruits stay fresh indefinitely, untouched by the ravages of time in the mortal world.

consumption_effect.description: Provides sustenance and healing; may cause fairy yearning

items.name: Frisk
items.description: A sticky, luminescent paste; actually the seminal fluid of the night-boars that sometimes visit Dolmenwood. Odourless, but has a faint, bitter flavour.

consumption_effect.description: Amplifies empathy; allows detection of lies and prevents lying

items.name: Golden Aspintheon
items.description: A legendary draught said to be only distilled in Fairy. The spirit has a rich, golden hue, glimmering with motes of silvery radiance. Its taste is exquisite and differs based on the preferences of the imbiber.

consumption_effect.description: Induces sublime joviality

items.name: Golden Aspintheon (bottle)
items.description: A legendary draught said to be only distilled in Fairy. The spirit has a rich, golden hue, glimmering with motes of silvery radiance. Its taste is exquisite and differs based on the preferences of the imbiber.

consumption_effect.description: Induces sublime joviality

items.name: Green Aspintheon
items.description: A deep green spirit, swirling with enigmatic clouds. The flavour is of bitter herbs tempered with the sweetness of spring nectar.
items.taste: Bitter herbs tempered with sweetness of spring nectar

consumption_effect.description: Induces merry boisterousness; allows sight of invisible fairies

items.name: Green Aspintheon (bottle)
items.description: A deep green spirit, swirling with enigmatic clouds. The flavour is of bitter herbs tempered with the sweetness of spring nectar.
items.taste: Bitter herbs tempered with sweetness of spring nectar

consumption_effect.description: Induces merry boisterousness; allows sight of invisible fairies

items.name: Ishwagrande
items.description: A resinous ochre dust that smells strongly of pine sap.

consumption_effect.description: Creates incapacitating smoke cloud; may cause curse of befuddlement

items.name: Kitty-Nibbles
items.description: Little, crunchy almond-flavoured biscuits, each baked with a cat's paw-print in the top.

consumption_effect.description: Grants attack bonus when in Grimalkin form

items.name: Lethe
items.description: A silvery ooze typically contained in rough clay bottles. Has an odour akin to rust. Lethe is distilled from the brains of those who have bathed in the Lethean Well.

consumption_effect.description: Induces deep introspection; grants Wisdom bonus

items.name: Mallow-Puff
items.description: Pale violet pipeleaf, loosely chopped. Smells of rich, smoky, apple and burns with a bright white flame.

consumption_effect.description: Produces mobile puffs of smoke when smoked

items.name: Memory Dust
items.description: A fine, pearlescent dust, renowned for its ability to expand the mind's capacity for the energies required by arcane spell memorisation.

consumption_effect.description: Allows memorisation of additional spell; highly addictive

items.name: Ourob
items.description: A thick, swirling mushroom brew of indigo, black, and purple hue that is brewed by mosslings. Reeks of acidic rot. Good vintages are fermented for at least 5 years.

consumption_effect.description: Causes digestive bubbling; pacifies fungal creatures

items.name: Prigwort Black
items.description: A pure black spirit that tastes of aniseed with an undertone of lemon. Once the pride of Prigwort's distillery House Oberon, the art of producing this spirit was lost a century ago.

consumption_effect.description: Grants sharpness of mind; allows seeing auras and detecting alignment

items.name: Prigwort Black (bottle)
items.description: A pure black spirit that tastes of aniseed with an undertone of lemon. Once the pride of Prigwort's distillery House Oberon, the art of producing this spirit was lost a century ago.

consumption_effect.description: Grants sharpness of mind; allows seeing auras and detecting alignment

items.name: Purple Shag
items.description: Thick-cut, deep purple pipeleaf dotted with pale yellow, scintillating crystals. Smells of dewy grass and produces a thin, sweet-scented smoke.

consumption_effect.description: Induces frivolity; grants morale bonus and fear resistance

items.name: Shandycoiffe Sparkle
items.description: A deep pink sparkling wine brewed from the fruits of Lord Gladhand's orchards. Smells of luscious, ripe fruit—a different kind on each smelling.

consumption_effect.description: Causes changing skin and hair hues; dispels polymorph effects

items.name: Shandycoiffe Sparkle (bottle)
items.description: A deep pink sparkling wine brewed from the fruits of Lord Gladhand's orchards. Smells of luscious, ripe fruit—a different kind on each smelling.

consumption_effect.description: Causes changing skin and hair hues; dispels polymorph effects

items.name: Snobble's Blend
items.description: A rough-leafed tea of chestnut hue, sparkling with silver motes. Has a delightful yet elusive aroma reminiscent of high summer.
items.smell: Delightful, elusive; reminiscent of high summer

consumption_effect.description: Induces daydreams and reverie; heals 1 HP; repels mogglewomps

items.name: Sprite Fancies
items.description: Dainty square cakes, frosted with congealed dreams. Smell of honey and hypnagogia.

consumption_effect.description: Grants semi-invisibility while speaking or singing

items.name: Sticky Gilly
items.description: Long, moist fronds of sticky, green pipeleaf. Reeks of pondweed. The smoke is thick, green, and tends to form piscine faces.

consumption_effect.description: Grants water breathing ability when smoked

items.name: Tarts of Amicability
items.description: Dainty baked tarts with a delightful almond glaze, topped with a glacé cherry.

consumption_effect.description: Causes the consumer to view the giver as a trusted friend

items.name: Wanton Wisp
items.description: A fine, supple pipeleaf of sparkling, golden hue, cultivated in Fairy. Produces coils and spirals of violet smoke, smelling of rosemary and peach.

consumption_effect.description: Produces smoke faces that entertain with sylvan songs and jokes

items.name: Wyrm-Leaf
items.description: A coarse pipeleaf of deep purple hue, with strands that writhe slowly when exposed to air. Hisses and produces thick, coiling smoke.

consumption_effect.description: Allows exhaling a fire blast in a cone 15' long by 10' wide

_metadata.extraction_note: Updated with consumption_effect, smell, taste fields
